name: Spherunner
description:
Take control of your sphere and finish all of the fourteen levels. Try to unlock all of the 54 stars in classic mode, or play for fun with the easy version. The game require a mouse to work fine! 

Website : http://spherunner.antarka.com/

Team site : http://antarka.com/

Tools : http://craftstud.io/

Twitter :  https://twitter.com/Team_antarka

Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0JBvsnBzPhzdARCH7c4pFQ

Steam : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=252694256

Developers : 

  • GENTILHOMME Thomas :  Leader, UI-Designer, level-designer, web-developer
  • MALAJ Alexandre : Head developer
  • CARON Gwenaël : FX-Designer, modeler, level-designer
  • MONTES Irvin : Composer
  • San : level-artist
